custom_fields.key_topics: The key topics are basic dance moves, Indian dance, Western dance, and Salsa/Couple dance.
custom_fields.prerequisite_knowledge: Students are not expected to have any prior experience with dancing.
custom_fields.assessment_structure: The assessment structure is purely based on participation and attendance. Please note that two absences will lead to you failing the StuCo course.
custom_fields.goals: The goal of this course to help students have the skills and confidence to dance and destress with physical exercise
custom_fields.relevance: Dancing helps you gain physical fitness, self-confidence, mental relaxation, agility, flexibility, and coordination. Additionally, it's a great skill to have at social gatherings!
custom_fields.learning_resources: Our learning resources are step-by-step dance tutorial videos made by the instructors for the students and YouTube dancing videos to gain an understanding of the different themes we will be learning.
custom_fields.extra_time_commitment:
Students are expected to practice the dance routine taught in class in order to be prepared for the next class where we learn more.
Additionally, with this course, students get the opportunity to perform at the International Day with the ABCD team. This will require extra practice hours.

long_desc: Any Body Can Dance is a semesterlong introductory course to dancing. This course equips students with basic dance movements and helps them gain dancing skills in various themes such as Western, Salsa and Indian.
name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): ABCD Any Body Can Dance
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): ABCD Any Body Can Dance
